title: Create a Doc in a Space or Folder
steps: In the Sidebar, hover over a Space or Folder.

title: Create a Doc from a Doc, List, Form, or Whiteboard
steps: In the Sidebar, hover over a Doc, List, Form, or Whiteboard.

title: Create a Doc view
steps: From the Views Bar, click + View.

title: Create a Doc from the location header
steps: At the top of the Space, Folder, or List, expand the location header.
From the location header or the breadcrumbs, click the ellipsis ... next to the location name.

title: Create a Doc from the toolbar
steps: In the toolbar, click + New. Or use the keyboard shortcut T.

title: Create a Doc from Docs Hub
steps: In the Sidebar, hover to the right of Docs Hub.
If you don't see Docs Hub, you'll need to pin Docs Hub to the Sidebar.

title: Create a Doc using Slash Commands
steps: Type /Doc from anywhere text can be used.
Press Enter to open a blank Doc.
